name: biomni-get-fda-drug-label-info
title: Biomni: Get Fda Drug Label Info
description: Retrieves FDA drug label information from the OpenFDA database
content:
Overview

Retrieves FDA drug label information from the OpenFDA database, providing comprehensive prescribing information including indications, dosing, contraindications, warnings, and adverse reactions.

Input Parameters

  • drug_name (required): Name of drug to retrieve label information
  • sections (optional): Specific label sections to retrieve (e.g., ["indications_and_usage", "warnings", "adverse_reactions"])

Input Format

{
  "drug_name": "Metformin",
  "sections": ["indications_and_usage", "dosage_and_administration", "warnings_and_precautions"]
}

Biological Use Case

Provides authoritative, FDA-approved prescribing information for clinical decision support. Essential for healthcare providers to access official drug labeling, understand approved uses, identify contraindications, and review safety information. Supports evidence-based prescribing and patient counseling.

Output

Comprehensive FDA label information including brand names, active ingredients, indications, dosing, warnings, and adverse reactions saved to fda_label_info_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/pharmacology/get_fda_drug_label_info.py --drug-name "${drugName}" ${sections:+--sections "${sections}"} -o "${outputDir}"
